nodes.text: P-X5G was a Probe droid affiliated with the Galactic Republic and stationed near the catacombs of Ossus during the Invasion of Ossus.

The droid's primary programming was to calculate a mutant Geonosian approach vector. However its sensors proved to be insufficient in the subterranean soil, therefore being required to plant supplemental sensors across an area near the Jedi Temple in the canyons to better monitor the enemy.
